errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.failedToSwitchTenant: Failed to switch tenant. Please try again.
errors.failedToLoad: Failed to load data. Please refresh the page.
errors.failedToSave: Failed to save changes. Please try again.
errors.failedToDelete: Failed to delete item. Please try again.

hints.rbacScopeOrg: ORG scope: This role applies to all sites in the organization. Users with this role have the same permissions across all sites.
hints.rbacScopeSite: SITE scope: This role applies only to a specific site. Users need to be assigned this role per site.
hints.rbacScopeCannotChange: Scope cannot be changed after role creation. Choose carefully based on whether you need organization-wide or site-specific permissions.
hints.draftEnvironment: Draft environment: Your changes are saved but not visible to visitors. Use this to work on pages before publishing.
hints.productionEnvironment: Production environment: This is the live version visible to visitors. Changes here are immediately public.
hints.publishAction: Publishing moves your draft changes to production, making them visible to visitors. This action cannot be easily undone.
hints.featureOverride: Feature overrides allow you to enable or disable features beyond your plan limits. Overrides are site-specific and may affect billing.
hints.featureOverrideWarning: Enabling a feature not in your plan creates an override. This may result in additional charges or require plan upgrade.
hints.deploymentExplanation: Deployments are automatic processes that publish your changes to hosting. Each publish action creates a deployment record showing success or failure.
hints.deploymentHistory: This shows the history of all publish and deployment operations. Successful deployments make your changes live, failed ones need attention.
hints.policyControlled: This capability is controlled by organization policies. Even if granted in a role, it can be disabled by policies. Check Policies tab to manage.
hints.effectivePermissions: Effective permissions show what a user can actually do after combining all their roles (org + site) and applying policies. This is the final result.
hints.effectivePermissionsExplanation: Select a user and optionally a site to see their final permissions. This combines org roles, site roles, and policy restrictions.
hints.designVsPageBuilder: Design workspace is a general page builder interface. Pages tab shows specific pages you can edit. Both use the same builder engine.
hints.pageBuilderHint: Use the page builder to create and edit pages. Changes are saved to draft first, then you can publish to production.
